## GerstnerWaveGenerator.setWaveDirection() method

Sets the angle of the wave direction in radians.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setWaveDirection(waveIndex: number, angle: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  waveIndex | number | index of the wave to set. |
|  angle | number | angle of the wave direction in radians. |

**Returns:**

void
